specs.purpose: An agent application that gathers data and information relevant to a given topic and generates a coherent and comprehensive report.
workflows: Install and manage dependencies using Poetry.
Define and execute research and reporting tasks.
Configure and utilize different LLM environments (Azure or Local OpenAI).
Evaluate the performance of tasks executed by the agents.
Enable dynamic input handling and API data pulling before task execution.
Log and review results and metrics post task execution.
Support custom tool integration for enhanced agent functionalities.
Run, train, replay, and test the crew execution via command line interface.
Generate detailed research reports based on the latest information on a specified topic.
Sequentially or hierarchically manage task execution processes.
